trigger.Name: StartFadeEffect
trigger.script:
g_ObjCont:SetGameTime( 10, 0, 21, 5, 2023 ) SetRadarUpgrade(1) SetWeather(0)
Fly("start_game", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, 0, 0.1, 0, 1) StartCinematic() UpdateCinematic(1)
AddCinematicMessage(77773, 0)
TActivate("StartFadeEffect_End") trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: cutEntersToTunnel
trigger.script:
SaveAllToleranceStatus(RS_NEUTRAL)
Fly("tunel_cam01", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, 0, 6, 1, 1) StartCinematic()
TActivate("TunelOpenGate") TActivate("cutEntersToTunnel_End") trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: TunelOpenGate
trigger.script: local g = GetEntityByName("tunel_gate") if g then g:SetNodeAction(AT_RESERVED4) end CreateNewSgNodeObject("ET_S_DUNGEON_OPEN_GATE", "sound_gate1", -1, -1, CVector(815, 259, 1054), Quaternion(0, 0, 0, 0), 0) TActivate("TunelOpenGate_SoundEnd") trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: TunelOpenGate_SoundEnd
trigger.script: local s = GetEntityByName("sound_gate1") if s then s:Remove() end CreateNewSgNodeObject("ET_S_DUNGEON_OPEN_GATE_END", "sound_gate2", -1, -1, CVector(815, 259, 1054), Quaternion(0, 0, 0, 0), 0) trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: cutEntersToTunnel_End
trigger.script:
local g = GetEntityByName("tunel_gate") if g then g:SetNodeAction(AT_STAND2) end
for i=1,2 do local s = GetEntityByName("sound_gate"..i) if s then s:Remove() end end
TDeactivate("TunelOpenGate") TDeactivate("TunelOpenGate_SoundEnd")
TActivate("cutEntersToTunnel_Fade") trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: cutEntersToTunnel_Fade
trigger.script:
Fly("tunel_cam01", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, 0, 0.1, 0, 1) StartCinematic()
AddCinematicMessage(77773, 0)
CreateNewSgNodeObject("ET_S_DUNGEON_ENTERS", "fx", -1, -1, GetPlayerVehicle():GetPosition(), Quaternion(0, 0, 0, 0), 0)
TActivate("cutEntersToTunnel_FadeEnd") trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: cutEntersToTunnel_FadeEnd
trigger.script:
RestoreAllToleranceStatus()
local fx = GetEntityByName("fx") if fx then fx:Remove() end
PassToMap("r0m1", "FromR0M0", -1, 1) trigger:Deactivate()
